mention_address: "Castaic Lake, Castaic Reservoir Road, Los Angeles County, California, United States of America"
attraction_reviewComments: We love to walk the dog on weekends around the lake. If you park outside then there is no price to go in. Makes you feel like you are on a vacation.
We recently visited Castaic and were happy with our choice. A few downsides...the water level is very low this year, some of the people we encountered were not the highest quality... read more
